PotentialScoring — YYYYYYY¶

This module provides YYYYY.

Module Syntax¶

Module Contents¶

class PotentialScoring.PotentialScoring(Scoring)¶

Docstring missing.

score(compBox)¶

This method does a node per node comparison of two equally dimensioned grids. It returns the sum of absolute distances over all nodes.
